code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";const PREFIX="coditor";export default function UseLocalStorage(Key,initialValue){const prefixKey=PREFIX+Key;const[value,setValue]=useState(()=>{const jsonValue=localStorage.getItem(prefixKey);if(jsonValue!=null)return JSON.parse(jsonValue);if(typeof initialValue==="function"){return initialValue();}else{return initialValue;}});useEffect(()=>{localStorage.setItem(prefixKey,JSON.stringify(value));},[prefixKey,value]);return[value,setValue];}
